Drawing on the canvas¶

Now that the bot is calibrated & we have also performed a check on the 2 way communication between them, it’s time to finally start with the main purpose of this project i.e. Making the bot draw something on the canvas.

After you press Start Drawing , it should finally lead you too:

Fig 1 : Drawing page.

Try to draw something on the highlighted area. Once your artwork is ready, press Submit and the bot should start drawing your artwork on the canvas.

In case your artwork goes wrong, you can press Reset and start afresh.
